title: RWRK Watch Face
summary: RWRK is a modern watch face in a timeless design.
description: Premium contents :★ 3 premium themes★ Choose active mode duration (from 5 seconds to 1 minute)★ Change text logo★ Full ambient mode★ Empty hands optionFree features :★ 3 free themes★ Phone battery level★ Watch battery level★ Steps counter level★ Day indicator★ Night mode (automatic style change at sunset/sunrise)★ Optional sweep second hand★ Optional tick marks★ Optional short notifications★ Optional translucent notifications★ Optional notifications in ambient mode★ Ambient mode (low-bit and burn-in protection)★ Mute mode (less contrast when phone is muted)★ Choose ambient mode brightnessPermissions :- Coarse location : in order to compute the sunrise and sunset time wherever you are.- In-app billing : for premium upgrade.Works with Asus ZenWatch (1, 2), LG G Watch (R), LG Watch Urbane, Moto 360 (1, 2), Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Huawei Watch, etc.Requires Android Wear 5.0Credits :• Font Sarpanch by Indian Type Foundry (info@indiantypefoundry.com), licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1 (http://scripts.sil.org/OFL)Created by Eric Plaquevent
descriptionHTML:
Premium contents :
★ 3 premium themes
★ Choose active mode duration (from 5 seconds to 1 minute)
★ Change text logo
★ Full ambient mode
★ Empty hands option

Free features :
★ 3 free themes
★ Phone battery level
★ Watch battery level
★ Steps counter level
★ Day indicator
★ Night mode (automatic style change at sunset/sunrise)
★ Optional sweep second hand
★ Optional tick marks
★ Optional short notifications
★ Optional translucent notifications
★ Optional notifications in ambient mode
★ Ambient mode (low-bit and burn-in protection)
★ Mute mode (less contrast when phone is muted)
★ Choose ambient mode brightness


Permissions :
- Coarse location : in order to compute the sunrise and sunset time wherever you are.
- In-app billing : for premium upgrade.

Works with Asus ZenWatch (1, 2), LG G Watch (R), LG Watch Urbane, Moto 360 (1, 2), Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3, Huawei Watch, etc.

Requires Android Wear 5.0


Credits :
• Font Sarpanch by Indian Type Foundry (info@indiantypefoundry.com), licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1 (http://scripts.sil.org/OFL)

Created by Eric Plaquevent
comments: Just buying the premium to support hoodie studio. This face is cool but the other two are amazing! Keep making faces and put me on a newsletter!
Another great app, very responsive! Would be nice to change the text color through premium features. Keep up the good work!
It would be great if you could display the weather instead of steps
Paid for it... When do I get it?
This has been my watch face for couple weeks now. Really like it. Hope to see more from this developer.
